text.119_Siman, 2_Seif: The reason that one would not make a bracha when the lead-lined vessel involves lead on the inside is because such lead is just to make the vessel more beautiful.
text.394_Siman, 1_Seif: "We do not say on the 29th of Adar" etc. The reason given (Terumat HaDeshen siman 292) is that all cases which depend on a number of days qualify for us to say part of the last day is equivalent to a full last day. This is not the case by mourning [one's parents] which in all cases requires [a full] twelve months. If one were to say, "part of it is like all of it," one would only be required to mourn a small part of the last month, and this is obviously not correct.

work: Turei Zahav on Shulchan Arukh, Yoreh De'ah
